Dwt

Class KeyWord

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dwt.KeyWord

  • public class KeyWord
extends Object
    This class is used for treating the signals of the keywords stored in a folder. Each file of keyword (nwt) will correspond to an instance of this class.
    Author:
    Yue HE & Falitokiniaina RABEARISON

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyWord(String filePath_, String keyword_, double[] nwt_, int delta_)
      This is used during reading the whole files of a folder (just putting in the memory without anycomputations).
      KeyWord(String filePath_, String keyword_, double[] nwt_, int delta_, double[] partNt_)
      After selecting the window, subKeywords of the above Keyword are created, so this method used to instantiate that subSignals of Keywords.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyWord

        public KeyWord(String filePath_,
       String keyword_,
       double[] nwt_,
       int delta_)
        This is used during reading the whole files of a folder (just putting in the memory without anycomputations).
        Parameters:
        filePath_ - path to the file
        keyword_ - name of the file (conventionally is the keyword)
        nwt_ - Signal of the keyword, read from the file
        delta_ - input from the user, read from the file 'param' used for the computation of SW1 and SW2

      • KeyWord

        public KeyWord(String filePath_,
       String keyword_,
       double[] nwt_,
       int delta_,
       double[] partNt_)
        After selecting the window, subKeywords of the above Keyword are created, so this method used to instantiate that subSignals of Keywords. and run the computations (Computation of SW1, SW2 and autocorrelation).
        Parameters:
        filePath_ - path to the nwt file
        keyword_ - name of the file, the keyword
        nwt_ - part of the keyword signal, corresponding to the window
        delta_ - input from the user, read from the file 'param' used for the computation of SW1 and SW2
        partNt_ - part of the nt signals corresponding to the window

    • Method Detail

      • setLongNt

        public static void setLongNt(String filePath)
        Read the signals from nt file and store them in 'longNt', a vector of double.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path to the nt file.

      • computations

        public void computations()
        Compute SW1, SW2 and autocorelation of each part of Keyword (according to the window).

      • computeCrossCorrelation

        public void computeCrossCorrelation(LinkedList<KeyWord> keyWordsList1)
        Compute cross correlation of the keyword with the whole list of significan keywords.
        Parameters:
        keyWordsList1 -
